Kevin Love

Kevin Wesley Love ▪ Instagram: kevinlove

Position: Power Forward and Center ▪ Shoots: Right

6-8, 251lb (203cm, 113kg)

Team: Miami Heat

Born: September 7, 1988 in Santa Monica, California us

Relatives: Father Stan Love

College: UCLA

High School: Lake Oswego in Lake Oswego, Oregon

Recruiting Rank: 2007 (2)

Draft: Memphis Grizzlies, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2008 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 29, 2008

Experience: 16 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Kevin Love?

Kevin Love is 36 years old.

Where was Kevin Love born?

Kevin Love was born in Santa Monica, California.

When was Kevin Love born?

Kevin Love was born on September 7, 1988.

How tall is Kevin Love?

Kevin Love is 6-8 (203 cm) tall.

How much does Kevin Love weigh?

Kevin Love weighs 251 lbs (113 kg).

Is Kevin Love in the Hall of Fame?

Kevin Love is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kevin Love drafted?

Kevin Love was drafted by Memphis Grizzlies, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2008 NBA Draft.

What position does Kevin Love play?

Power Forward and Center.

What is Kevin Love's net worth?

Kevin Love has made at least $272,173,517 playing professional basketball.

How much does Kevin Love make?

Kevin Love made $31,258,256 in 2021.

What does Kevin Love average?

Kevin Love averages 5.8 points, 4.2 rebounds, and 1.1 assists per game.

How many rings does Kevin Love have?

Kevin Love has won one championship.

What is Kevin Love's Twitter account?

Kevin Love is on Twitter at kevinlove.

What is Kevin Love's Instagram account?

Kevin Love is on Instagram at kevinlove.
